程序包 fiat.serialization

类 Error

java.lang.Object
fiat.serialization.Message
fiat.serialization.Error
public class Error extends Message
Represents an Error and provides serialization/deserialization
版本:
1.3 update getRequest method add getReuqestinfo method, which get all information after the request fix some small problem, such super setTimestampe update string request to final string request
作者:
Maiqi Hou
